comment._content: LOC: only one "r" in the name Mary, please.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Incidentally, several agents are already offering prints of this photo (all with the misspelling noted above) on various internet outlets -- including an idiot on Amazon who will make you a big one for only $447.00 -- maybe not an idiot after all, if someone actually takes him up on that offer!

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Wystan: In the George Grantham Bain Collection, from which this photograph comes, we sometimes have both a glass negative and a printed photograph. In this case, I was able to locate the photograph and with information noted on the verso, learned that this is Mary Kennon Evans of Portland, Oregon, age 89, mother of Brig. Gen. Robert Kennon Evans. Brig. Gen. Evans is the gentleman pictured on the table. An image of Evans elsewhere in this same collection can be seen here. We can expand this record with more details when we update.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: she might be registering to vote. Someplace (in this LOC collectionI remember seeing some other ladies in Oregon who were ceremoniously registering in Oregon, which was in the vanguard in enfranchising women. Here is the photo I was thinking of: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2555558153/
